_header: My lief is faren in land
Note: First line quoted in Chaucer’s Nun’s Priest’s Tale, (Canterbury Tales VII.2879; 142).
_description: A lover’s lament — one 7-line stanza (ababcbc) introduced by 3713 and serving as sixth stanza of same

CamTCC599.First Lines: My lefe ys faren in a londAllas why ys she so…
CamTCC599.Last Lines:
…Where ever she ryde or goWith trew love a thousand
                    fold
